FuncDef: The display ip extcommunity-filter command displays detailed configurations of the VPN-Target extended community filter.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the basic VPN-Target extended community filter number.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 199.

Specifies the advanced VPN-Target extended community filter number.
The value is an integer that ranges from 200 to 399.

Examples: Extended Community filter basic filter: bas-abc
Extended Community filter advanced filter: adv-abc
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The extended community attribute is a BGP-specific attribute. An extended community filter is used to filter VPN routes.
You can run the display ip extcommunity-filter command to:
View detailed information about a configured VPN-Target extended community filter.Check whether an VPN-Target extended community filter has been deleted after running the undo ip excommunity-filter command.

Precautions
The display ip extcommunity-filter command:
Displays the configuration information about a specified VPN-Target extended community filter if the number or name of the VPN-Target extended community filter is specified.Displays the configuration information about all VPN-Target extended community filters if neither the number nor name of the VPN-Target extended community filter is specified.Does not display any information if the VPN-Target extended community filter does not exist in the system or the VPN-Target extended community filter that is queried does not exist.
